encodeEncfs(byte[]) - Static method in class org.mrpdaemon.sec.encfs.EncFSBase64
EncFS variant of Base64 encoding firstly converts the stream to base 64 by stored as the higher bits of the last byte in the low bits of next byte (using only 6 bits per byte) Input Bytes: aaAAAAAA bbbbBBBB ccccccCC Output Bytes: 00AAAAAA 00BBBBaa 00CCbbbb 00ccccccc
